alert.note: Alert for Logan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 3:02PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN LOGAN...SIMPSON AND SOUTHWESTERN WARREN COUNTIES THROUGH 245 PM CDT... At 202 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles northeast of Russellville, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Bowling Green, Russellville, Auburn, Woodburn, Hillsdale, Dennis, Rockfield, Rich Pond, Geddes and Chandlers Chapel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
